# Chaplain There's something about the vast infinity of space that turns men to prayer... Especially if they get thrown into it without a space suit.
As a chaplain, you would ideally proselytize whatever crazy religion you've made up for that round over your headset. However, besides your office, the hellish crematorium next to your office, and the rarely used morgue, you have no access.
## Religions: You are free to propagate any present day religions you know of, or even invent one of your own! Just make sure it doesn't go against NanoTrasen and its values, or you may well end up in the brig.
If you don't already have one, build an altar and find an offering to place on-top:
These altars can be constructed by placing the following offerings atop your base convert altar:
- Bananium Altar: 1 x Bananium - Chaos Altar: 1 x Plasma - Druid Altar: 1 x Wooden Plank - Fanged Altar: 1 x Raw Meat - Heaven Altar: 1 x Templar Helmet - Maints Altar: 1 x Budget Insulated Gloves - Nanotrasen Altar: 1 x Plasteel - Space-Christian Altar: 1 x Nun Hood - Technology Altar: 1 x Capacitor - Toolbox Altar: 1 x Toolbox - Clockwork Altar: 1 x Small Power Cell - Blue Altar: 1 x Makeshift Shield
## Holy Artefacts
### Armaments Beacon Allows you to choose a set of armor. All armors have identical stats.
### Null Rod the Null Rod is the chaplins trusty tool, with it the chaplin is one of the most feared crew memebers for magical beings, and without it the chaplin is nothing.
### Null Rod [Default] holds the power to transform into any form you desire,altough dont write off the defult nullrod as it is a great weapon without any gimmiks, also you get extra robust points for using it
Does good damage (10 blunt and 10 holy) at average speed.
### Atheist's Fedora [Nanotrasen Altar] the latest fasion trend among "cool" chaplins thses days, its fitted with spiecial Nanotrasen pattented boomerang technology so you wont have to worry about loosing it.
Deals low melee damage (5 slash and 10 holy) with average throwing damage (10 slash and 10 holy) with average attack speed.
### God Hand [Chaos Altar] infuse you're own hand with the power of the GODS replacing it with a firey, blazing, holy hand.
Deals good damage ([color=red]10 Heat[/color], 4 slash and 10 holy) at average speed with the added ability of applying fire stacks and instantly hard grabing the target.
### Holy Claymore [Heaven Altar] the number one choice for space crusaders this holy sword has been one of the most reliable weapons throught out the history of space crusades
right clicking with this weapon while wealding it shoots out a yellow bolt of holy energy, hitting a enemy who is marked with the bolt will both deal more damage and [color=green]and heal you for twenty brute, and ten airloss[/color]
Deals good damage (13 slash and 10 holy) It's melee speed is average with a 0.5 shots per second ranged bolt.
### Monk's Staff [Nature Altar] a wooden staff Typically used to beat the literal and metaphorical Devil out of someone. its real power lies in the staffs ability to deal stamina damage.
Deals low damage (2.5 blunt and 6 holy) with additional stamina damage (10) at a fast attack speed.
### His Holy Chainsaw [Toolbox Altar] do you like chainsaws? are you midly insane? then this is the nullrod for you compleatly replace youre amr with a full on chainsaw and hack up those demons.
Needs weilding, but deals low damage (2 blunt, 3 slash and 6 holy. With 20 structural to tear into places) at a very fast attack speed.
### Rosary [Space Christian Altar]
for those who dont want to get their hands dirty this nullrod has got the best ustilty out of all of them. allowes you to pray to it to heal in a decently large area while also dealing holy damage to unholy beings.
does little damage, (3 blunt and 10 holy) for both melee and area of effect hits.
### Casul & Jackal [Technology Altar]
why go thorugh all the trouble of getting robust when you can just shoot them. comes in pair of 2 pistols that can only be shot together, they may be reloaded by whispering a prayer into them.
Each pistol does low damage,and comes in a special holster, deals (5 peircing and 4 holy per shot)
### Grey Emperor's Glove [Maintenance Altar] the tider GOD has chosen you to be his vessel, replace you're hand with HIS and let HIS power flow through you.
allowes you to use any tool you need and is fully insulated
Deals nice damage (14 holy and 9 blunt) with average attack speed.
### Arythmic Knife [Fanged Altar] knife of the speed addicts, randomly speeds and slows you down at intervals, between 0.6x move speed and 2.0x move speed.
Average attack speed and lowish damage (9 slash and 10 holy).
### Honkmother's maw [Bananium Altar]
Honkmother chosen, with this great power you must [bold]SLIP![/bold] slips the target on hit (with a long cooldown for sliping)
Average attack speed and lowish damage (10 blunt and 12 holy)
### Ratvarian Spear [Clockwork Altar] a spear scavanged and forged from the remains of the very dead clockwork god. a robust melee weapon with added range, and a good throwing one at that, tho it like to stick to stuff when thrown and is pretty annoying to pull out.
Average attack speed, and good damage (18 peircing, 10 holy, 25 peircing and 10 holy on throw)
### Bulwark [Blue Altar]
big sheild not much to say here
It blocks 15% of all damage unless planted, then its 100%. It does low damage (5 Slash and 10 Holy) at slow speed.
### Enchanting
You can use your Bible and any Altar of your choosing to [textlink="enchant items." link="Enchanting"]
### Spirit Candles You can craft a spirit candle by putting a candle on a skull. Spirit Candles are useful against evil spirits like Wraith.
When they are ignited, they create a 12x12 tile area that reveals evil spirits. It also has a special function when you use it in-hand. By using it [bold]when an evil spirit is within(!!) your 12x12 area[/bold], it will make them corporeal.
It has 2 charges per spirit candle, and [bold]it only consumes a charge when you reveal the evil spirit[/bold].
It drops the skull once the candle has melted, so you can craft another one.
## Duties
- Church Services: Give sermons and sing hymns. - Proselytizing: Most crew members are godless heathens, show them god's love. - Burial Services: Security or Medical may require someone, or something... to be cremated, familiarise yourself with your Chapel so you can make things quick! - [bold] Metaphysical Investigation: Most crew aren't aware of the threats posed by the unholy, be on the look out for anything suspicious. [/bold]
### Metaphysical Threats As Chaplain you are the first line of defence against metaphysical threats, [bold] ready your Null Rod - the time is now. [/bold]
[color=red][bold] Use of excessive force against targets which you cannot confirm are metaphysical threats may land you in trouble with the law, use caution and investigate carefully. [/bold][/color]
